In my current role I am responsible for--End to end recruitment-Handling Vendor Management System, Client Relationship Management-Screen, interview, and recommend prospective employees for employment in experienced technical positions-Work with search firms or other placement agencies, and determines optimum recruitment method to develop and maintain a highly qualified candidate pool-Familiar with a variety of the field's concepts, practices, and procedures-Relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals-Perform a variety of tasks-Work under general supervision

POSITION: EMPLOYEE RELATION-Organized induction programmes -Gather information on workers' feelings about factors that affect worker morale, motivation, and efficiency-Meet with management to discuss possible actions to be taken-Handle people related issues such as disciplinary, performance management, grievance and absence management, attendance record

Employee Satisfaction SurveyDetails: The project was done:•	To find out the type of motivation that exists among the employees•	To find out the motivating factors for the employees•	To find out the type of motivation required at workplace tangible or intangible•	To find out the factors demotivating the employees•	To map the employees to Maslow’s need hierarchy pyramid•	To provide the practical suggestion for the improvement of employee motivation
